text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Apex Legends, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Refurbished: Acer Nitro 5 AN515-51-504A 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 7th Gen 7300HQ (2.50 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. The build material is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is good, but I expected a bit more from the screen brightness on the Refurbished: Acer Nitro 5 AN515-51-504A 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 7th Gen 7300HQ (2.50 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Refurbished: Acer Nitro 5 AN515-51-504A 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 7th Gen 7300HQ (2.50 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop!

The Refurbished: Acer Nitro 5 AN515-51-504A 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 7th Gen 7300HQ (2.50 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for AAA gaming, but the fan noise could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Apex Legends, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Refurbished: Acer Nitro 5 AN515-51-504A 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 7th Gen 7300HQ (2.50 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. The battery life is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.
